hotels.title: 17th-Century Mansion Retreat in Fairytale Cheshire
hotels.description: For a splash of wow-factor, enjoy a stay at Crewe Hall Hotel & Spa, a stunning 17th-century Grade I-listed Jacobean mansion in picturesque Cheshire. Upon entering the manicured grounds, feel like you've stepped back to a time of opulence and splendour: discover period-style interiors with ornate ceilings and rich furnishings, plus an atmospheric Brasserie Bar and Lounge to enjoy an exquisite meal, and the elegant Sheridan Lounge to feast on Crewe Hall's famous afternoon tea. While the hotel celebrates its heritage roots, the modern comforts of the 21st century haven't been forgotten. Relax with a treatment at the spa, take a dip in the heated indoor swimming pool and swing into your escape with a round of tennis on the onsite courts.

hotels.title: Contemporary Spa Retreat in the Cheshire Countryside
hotels.description: Settle in for a cosy yet contemporary stay at The Park Royal Hotel & Spa, perfectly set in the charming village of Stretton in leafy Cheshire. Within close reach of the hotel, you can unearth some of the countryâ€™s best pubs, shopping precincts and attractions, with Chester, Liverpool and Manchester all an easy drive away. Feel immediately at home as you drop your bags within one of the stylish rooms and admire the ornate architecture that dates back as far as 1831. Choose to spend hours at the indulgent spa, complete a few laps of the heated pool, then retire each night to Topiary in the Park restaurant, the casual Lounge Bar or the outdoor terrace.
